Items.Title: Build
Items.Subtitle: Item Subtitle: 1
Items.Content: The Build Configuration is a 'type of build', a set of settings edited within the TeamCity UI and which are used to start a build and group the sequence of the builds. The settings include VCS settings (from where to checkout sources for the build), what build procedure to run (build steps and environment parameters), triggers (when to start a new build) and others. This build configuration referes to AIDA-WS project.

Items.Title: Release
Items.Subtitle: Item Subtitle: 2
Items.Description: Release a new version of AIDA WS
Items.Content: The Release Configuration is a 'type of build', a set of settings edited within the TeamCity UI and which are used to start a release and group the sequence of the steps. Settings include VCS settings (from where to checkout sources for the build), what build procedure to run (build steps and environment parameters), and triggers. This release configurations referes to AIDA-WS project and will have as output a release package.
